show.title: Almost Human
show.description: It's the year 2048, and Detective John Kennex wakes up from a 17 month coma. Outfitted with a synthetic appendage, John returns to duty and partners with Dorian, a flawed robot with human like emotions. Together they settle differences and solve crimes in the futuristic landscape.

show.title: Back in the Game
show.description: Terry was an All Star softball player until life threw her a couple curve balls: a baby, a lost college scholarship and a loser for a husband. After striking out on her own, Terry and her son Danny move in with her estranged father, Terry Sr. aka “The Cannon”.

show.title: Betrayal
show.description: Sara Hanley is a beautiful photographer and Jack McAllister is a top attorney. One evening they meet at an art showing and sparks fly. Whether their meetings were coincedental or deliberate, both realize that something was missing in their marriages and that they've found their soul mates in one another. The drama unfolds as they juggle their lives, their families, and their relationships with each other.

show.title: The Blacklist
show.description: Known as "The Concierge of Crime", former government agent Raymond Reddington was a fugitive who brokered deals for criminals all across the globe. For decades he eluded capture... until he turned himself in with an offer: He will help capture some of the most dangerous terrorists the world has seen, but only if he speaks to new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen.

show.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
show.description: BROOKLYN NINE-NINE is a workplace comedy that's not really about the job. It's about the men and women behind the badge – singing karaoke, grabbing a beer, and dabbling in each other's personal lives– all while protecting the fine people of Brooklyn

show.title: Cold Justice
show.description: In towns all across America, violent crime cases often go cold. In Cold Justice, Kelly Siegler, a former prosecutor and Yolanda McClary, a former crime scene investigator put their vast knowledge and experience to work helping law enforcement and victim's families get to the truth.

show.title: The Crazy Ones
show.description: Simon Roberts is an advertising genius whose unorthodox methods and unpredictable behavior would normally get someone fired... if they weren't the boss. Sydney Roberts, his daughter is the exact opposite; focused and organized and always watching out for her father, she's a hardworker with something to prove. Head of a powerful agency with powerful clients and brands, Simon, Sydney, and the rest of the firm get into all manner of crazy antics.

show.title: Dads
show.description: Dads explores the often treacherous terrain of the father-son landscape. The comedy series follows two successful guys – and childhood best friends – now in their mid-30s, whose relatively stable lives get turned upside down when their inappropriate and pain-in-the-neck patriarchs move in.

show.title: Dracula
show.description: It's the late 19th century, and the mysterious Dracula has arrived in London, posing as an American entrepreneur who wants to bring modern science to Victorian society. His reason for his travels is simple: he hopes to take revenge on those who cursed him with immortality centuries earlier. Everything seems to be going according to plan... until he becomes infatuated with a woman who appears to be a reincarnation of his dead wife.

show.title: Enlisted
show.description: ENLISTED is a comedy about three brothers who wind up together on a small Florida Army base. With wildly differing personalities, the three try to survive the trials of army life, brotherhood, and the trouble stirred up by the group of misfits who surround them.

show.title: The Goldbergs
show.description: The Goldbergs follows a family during the 80's through the eyes of Adam, the youngest, and his video camera.

show.title: Hello Ladies
show.description: Stuart is a web designer who relocated from England to LA. Follow along as the awkward Stuart dives into the LA social scene head-first and searches desperately for excitement, love, or a soul mate.

show.title: Hostages
show.description: A rogue FBI agent and his team take a surgeons's family hostage and orders her to kill the United States President, whom she is set to operate on the following day. When the stakes are kill or be killed, what will Dr. Ellen Sanders choose?

show.title: Ironside
show.description: Robert Ironside is a Detective in the gritty world of the NYPD. Despite having his spine shattered by a bullet just two years prior, he continues to serve among the best of them. Gritty, fearless, and with instincts second to none, follow Ironside and his handpicked team as they clean up the streets of New York.

show.title: Lucky 7
show.description: A group of seven gas station employees in Queens, New York have been chipping into a lottery pool for years, never thinking they'd actually win. Follow along as friendship is tested when the impossible happens and they get lucky. Money may solve some problems, but it always creates new ones.

show.title: Masters of Sex
show.description: William Masters and Virginia Johnson are the real-life pioneers of the science of human sexuality. Follow along in this drama that follows their unusual lives, romances, and the pop culture that surrounds them as sex is taken from the bedroom and into the living room, taking hold of media and never letting it go.

show.title: The Millers
show.description: Nathan Miller is recently divorced and looking forward to the singles life... that is until his parent's derail his plans. When he finally breaks news of his divorce, his father Tom is inspired to follow suit and stuns the family when he leaves Carol, his wife of 43 years. His absent-minded mom then decides to move in with Nathan, while his father imposes upon Nathan's little sister Debbie.

show.title: The Michael J. Fox Show
show.description: Mike Henry puts his career on hold to spend more time with his family and focus on his health after he was diagnosed with Parkinson's. But now five years later, with the kids busy growing up and Mike growing restless, it just might be time for him to get back to work. Having never wanted Mike to leave in the first place, his old boss Harris Green jumped at the chance to get him back on TV.

show.title: Mom
show.description: Newly sober single mom Christy struggles to raise two children in a world full of temptations and pitfalls. Testing her sobriety is her formerly estranged mother, now back in Christy's life and eager to share passive-aggressive insights into her daughter's many mistakes.

show.title: Once Upon a Time in Wonderland
show.description: In Victorian England, young and beautiful Alice tells an impossible tale of a strange new land that exists on the other side of a rabbit hole. An invisible cat, a hookah-smoking caterpillar and playing cards that can talk are just some of the fantastic things she's seen during her adventure.

show.title: The Originals
show.description: The Original Vampire family swore it to each other a thousand years ago. They pledged to remain together, always and forever. Now, centuries have passed, and the bonds of family are broken. Time, tragedy and hunger for power have torn the Original Family apart.

show.title: Reign
show.description: Hidden between the lines of the history books is the story of Mary Stuart, the young woman the world would come to know as Mary, Queen of Scots. The teenage Mary is already a headstrong monarch ─ beautiful, passionate and poised at the very beginning of her tumultuous rise to power.

show.title: Super Fun Night
show.description: Junior attorney Kimmie Boubier and her two best friends Helen-Alice and Marika have had a standing date every Friday night for the last 13 years. They even have a motto for what they call “Friday Night Fun Night”: “Always together! Always Inside!” However, Kimmie’s recent promotion throws a monkey wrench into the tradition, and she meets a dashingly handsome British attorney, Richard Royce.

show.title: Sean Saves the World
show.description: Sean's a divorced dad who's trying to juggle it all. From his overbearing boss and offbeat employees at work - to his pushy mom and weekends with his teenage daughter at home - handling it all is no easy task. So when Ellie, his 14-year-old bundle of joy, moves in full-time, it's a whole new challenge.

show.title: The Tomorrow People
show.description: They are the next evolutionary leap of mankind, a generation of humans born with paranormal abilities — the Tomorrow People. They are being hunted down by a group of scientists known as Ultra. Led by Dr. Jedikiah Price, Ultra sees the Tomorrow People as a very real existential threat from a rival species, and the outcast group has been forced to hide out in an abandoned subway station just beneath the surface of the human world.

show.title: Trophy Wife
show.description: They say the third time's the charm, and reformed party girl Kate is hoping that's true when she becomes the third wife of a slightly older man, Pete. They fell into each others' arms at a karaoke bar, and flash forward a year later, Kate finds herself with an instafamily complete with three stepchildren and two ex-wives. But Kate is determined to make this work and become a part of the family no matter what.

show.title: We Are Men
show.description: WE ARE MEN is a comedy about four single guys living in a short-term apartment complex who unexpectedly find camaraderie over their many missteps in love.

show.title: Welcome to the Family
show.description: Molly has managed to graduate from high school and has been accepted to college. Her proud parents are looking forward to an empty nest and are breathing a heavy sigh of relief.Across town, Molly's secret boyfriend, Junior Hernandez, is graduating from his high school and has plans to go to Stanford. Parents Miguel and Lisette are bursting with pride. Everything seems like it is falling into place for them, but unbeknownst to both families, Molly and Junior are about to become parents themselves.

show.title: Witches of East End
show.description: Witches of East End centers on the mysterious Beauchamp family: free-spirited artist Joanna and her two grown daughters, wild-child bartender Freya and shy librarian Ingrid, both of whom are unaware that they are gifted and cursed with a magical birthright.

show.title: MasterChef Junior
show.description: Move over grown-ups…the kids are taking over the kitchen! MASTERCHEF JUNIOR is a new culinary competition series for talented kids between the ages of 8 and 13 who love to cook.

show.title: Sleepy Hollow
show.description: In this modern-day twist on Washington Irving's classic, ICHABOD CRANE is resurrected and pulled two and a half centuries through time to unravel a mystery that dates all the way back to the founding fathers. Revived alongside Ichabod is the infamous Headless Horseman who is on a murderous rampage in present-day Sleepy Hollow.

show.title: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
show.description: Agent Phil Coulson assembles a small, highly select group of Agents from the worldwide law-enforcement organization known as S.H.I.E.L.D. Together they investigate the new, the strange, and the unknown across the globe, protecting the ordinary from the extraordinary.
